attributes.action: Stop energy companies offsetting debts on to other users
attributes.additional_details: Why should those people who like myself are making my payments, especially when I personally have a low income, pay for those who decide not to pay!!
attributes.background: We require the government to ensure that the "profit making" energy companies do not penalise those account holders by making them to cover the debts of others!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 

Decisions about the energy price cap - including adjustments to address supplier costs relating to debt - are a matter for Ofgem, not the UK Government or Parliament.
